subsections.name: plot | Line Charts
Basic Line Chart with the plot Function

subsections.description: How to make a plot in {language}. Examples of the plot function, line and marker types, custom colors, and log and semi-log axes.

subsections.name: Scatter
Scatter Plot with Colors and Sizes

subsections.description: How to make a scatter plot in {language}. {num_examples} examples of the scatter function.

subsections.name: Bar Charts
subsections.description: How to make a bar chart in {language}. {num_examples} examples of grouped, stacked, overlaid, and colored bar charts.

subsections.name: Box Plots
Box Plot That Displays the Underlying Data

subsections.description: How to make a box plot in {language}. {num_examples} examples of box plots in {language} that are grouped, colored, and display the underlying data distribution.

subsections.name: Bubble Charts

Simple Bubble Chart
Scatter plot with variable size and color
Marker Size, Color, and Symbol as an Array

subsections.description: How to make a bubble chart in {language}. Examples of scatter charts whose markers have variable color, size, and symbols.

subsections.name: Contour Plots
subsections.description: How to make a contour plot in {language}. {num_examples} examples of contour plots of matrices with subplots, custom color-scales, and smoothing.

subsections.name: Filled Area Plots
subsections.description: How to make a filled area plot in {language}. An area chart displays a solid color between the traces of a graph.

subsections.name: Error Bars
Error Bars as a Percentage of the y-Value
Asymmetric Error Bars with a Constant Offset

subsections.description: How to add error bars to a line, scatter, or bar chart. {num_examples} examples of symmetric, asymmetric, horizontal, and colored error bars.

subsections.name: Heatmaps
subsections.description: How to make a heatmap in {language} with a matrix. {num_examples} examples of colored and labeled heatmaps with custom colorscales.

subsections.name: Histograms
subsections.description: How to make a histogram in {language}. {num_examples} examples of colored, horizontal, and normal histogram bar charts.

subsections.name: 2D Histograms
2D Histogram of a Bivariate Normal Distribution
2D Histogram Overlaid with a Scatter Chart

subsections.description: How to make a 2D histogram in {language}. A 2D histogram is a visualization of a bivariate distribution.

subsections.name: Polar Charts
subsections.description: How to graph polar charts in {language}. {num_examples} examples of polar line, polar scatter and polar area charts.

subsections.name: Time Series
subsections.description: How to plot date and time in {language}. An example of a time-series plot.

subsections.name: Multiple Chart Types

A Contour and Scatter Plot
of the Method of Steepest Descent
Line Chart and a Bar Chart

subsections.description: How to design figures with multiple chart types in {language}. An example of a contour plot with a scatter plot and a bar chart with a line chart.

subsections.name: Network Graphs

subsections.description: How to visualize a network with the adjacency matrix in MATLAB. An example of MATLAB's gplot function.

subsections.description: How to visualize sparse matrices in MATLAB. An example of the spy function.

subsections.description: How to make an inset graph in {language}.

subsections.description: How to edit and style the font of graphs in {language}.

subsections.description: How to change the size of graphs in {language}.

subsections.description: How to set the privacy settings of plotly graphs in {language}.
